(OOC) I have only been a member of this RPG for a few
days, and I'm already sick of this Jason Lind guy. The
guy mods every chance he gets, and throws a tantrum
whenever someone says something about it.You say you
have "real life problems", Jason? Well then why get
mad and insult and curse at people over a simple
GAME??
People post here to relax and have fun writing. If you
cant respect that Jason, then why dont you leave this rpg?
